translation: I am the flavor in water, O Arjuna; I am the light in the moon and the sun; I am the syllable Om in all the Vedas, sound in the ether and virility in men.
commentary: 7.8 Taste: sapidity? I'm I? Apsu in water? Kaunteya O Kaunteya (son of Kunti)? Prabha light? Asmi am (I)? in the moon and the sun? Pranavah the syllable Om? in all the Vedas in all the Vedas? Sound: sound? Khe in ether?
